website_summaries.verdict: These cute little bears have endless possibilities for teaching counting, colors, patterns, and more.
pros: Includes 60 bears, 4 colored cups, tweezers, and container for storage
Can be used to develop color recognition, number recognition, fine motor skills, and other skills
cons: Bears are small and could present a choking hazard in children age 3 and younger
Some have trouble accessing the e-book

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality...Easy to Manipulate
customer_reviews.text: I am a preschool teacher, and I am super pleased with these Bears! The tweezers are very easy for my students to manipulate...my two-year-old can use them to sort the bears into the colored cups. A huge bonus came when the seller sent me free printable activity pages to use with the bears . I use them today and my kids loved counting, sorting, and completing the patterns using the printables.
customer_reviews.author: kaitlyn andrus

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: 18 month old loves playing with these. They keep her entertained for self play. Also easy to make up games and have fun with interactive play. I noticed after purchasing there are a bunch of similar products exactly like this with different prices. Some come with more bears. Some come in a bag. This one comes in a box which is nice to have a closed storage to keep them. It’s a perfect toddler toy transitioning from baby.
customer_reviews.author: julieTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & educational toy
customer_reviews.text: Great educational product, awesome overall. They are also very good quality. (We didn’t know what to expect with the durability of them but are impressed!) My 3 year old wants to pull these out every hour and can spend long periods of time playing with them, and working on his colors ❤️(Moms favorites are the toys that keep them busy & learning right!?). I want to tell all our friends about these cute bears!
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old cousin LOVES these bears. Whenever she visits she is always looking for them. Have had them for over a month now and surprisingly haven't lost any bears. She is 19 months now and still loves them. We are trying to teach her colors and counting but she just isn't interested in that yet. She had no problems using the tongs and likes using them while she "sorts". It has been a great investment and will provide years of learning. They do fit in her mouth and while she didn't put them in there at first she has done it twice so we do make sure to keep an eye on her while playing.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with the Legato Counting/Sorting Bears
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with the Legato Counting/Sorting Bears! My two yr old granddaughter Bella loves sorting. She hasn't quiet caught on to the matching the color of the bears with their coordinating cups, but she really loves filling up the cups and pouring them into another cup. She sits for ages playing with these which makes her Mommie very happy! The order came when expected and was in great condition. I will recommend these little bears to all my Grandmother friends for their little loves!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Babb

customer_reviews.title: They have been a great activity for him to improve both his fine motor ...
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loves these. They have been a great activity for him to improve both his fine motor skills and mastery of colors and sorting. The sky is the limit for how many activities can be done with them. After so many uses, they still look brand new and are easily stored in a cute little container.
customer_reviews.author: Chaka

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun and educational!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy! It’s so open ended. You can sort the Bears by color, count them, teach adding and subtraction, practice fine motor by picking them up with the tongs and placing them in cups. One way we play with them is I say a color and then my two year old and I pick up all of. That color before moving on to another. She’s thrilled with the set and loves that she can open and close the case herself. I was happy with the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer fraghia

customer_reviews.title: Wish the pieces were a little bigger, but overall great set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my almost 2-year-old who loves this kind of game. The bear pieces are pretty small--I wish they were a bit bigger. My daughter doesn't really put things in her mouth anymore, but if she did, I'd be concerned about her choking. Other than that, this kit is awesome! Everything fits into the little tote and is so cute! She loves using the tongs to move the bear pieces into the cups. This is a fun way for her to keep busy and practice colors and fine motor skills at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: BoScha

customer_reviews.title: Weak tongs
customer_reviews.text: Product is great but the tongs that come with it have zero resistance. So if you’re buying this item to strengthen your child’s hands, I wouldn’t suggest it. I did however get another item with stronger tongs which is working great with the bears and learning colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made product with a nice storage case!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loved this set of counting bears. He had fun sorting the different colors into the cups using the tweezers. The tweezers were surprisingly easy for him to use. Everything is well made and the case is perfect for storing it all in. The cups were also sturdy, not flimsy like I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with colors.
customer_reviews.text: Kiddo loves the color bears and is excited whenever I pull them out. He struggles with blue and purple because they seem close to him so we have to alternate the blues to help him see the difference. Other than that I think it's a great buy. Just beware that this is NOT for small children under 3 to use unsupervised. My 2 year old has put these in his mouth several times because they resemble candy.
customer_reviews.author: B Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great set of colored bears with matching cups!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of colored bears with the tongs and cup. I especially love that they have a great container to keep them in. The bears are made with great quality and have matching cups that come with them. There are so many things that parents, teachers, and therapists can use these for. I did end up buying other tongs for the kids I work with to use while using these bears. I feel like the tongs that come with them aren’t my favorite, but I didn’t buy these because of the tongs so that was okay with me!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Learning is Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love the price and quality of these. Toys do not have to be expensive and they can help children learn. I had no idea abouth the avivity book that would be emailed to me when I originally bought these. There are so many fun activities that are possible with this little toy from sorting, counting, moto skills with the tongs. Both our one year old and three year old love this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Hymn.Life

customer_reviews.title: A big hit for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is almost 3. The counting bears were a big hit. We spent lots of time lining them up, sorting them and making up different games with them like finding the one bear facing the opposite direction. He thought it was hilarious to close his eyes while I turned a bear around.. and then he had to spot it. He asks to play with them often. The company sent sheets with ideas or games to play with the bears but I forgot to print them out. They arrived right away. Don’t hesitate to get some!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun, lots of learning
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old grandson loves sorting these bears by color, but he's also working on counting and one-to-one correspondence as well. The activity cards will expand his learning as he develops number concepts. This is a toy and learning device that will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: Great toys for children with autism
customer_reviews.text: my granddaughter has autism and toys like this are very helpful especially since she can't go to her early learning classes with the virus going around. I would be interested to see what other types of things you have like this that would be good for someone with autism. She loves things with velcro she likes the sound they make she also likes the puzzles that you put the wooden pieces into the slots that they go in. I've bought her a couple of puzzles things like that and she really loves them.
customer_reviews.author: donna mann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Educational Activities
customer_reviews.text: These bears and matching cups make for great educational activities to do with my toddler. He also enjoys pouring them into the container and playing with them. Obviously, the bears are too small to leave with a child for independent play, so my only "complaint" is that I do wish they were available for purchase in a larger size. Legato also emailed me a PDF Counting Bears Activity eBook that I have yet to print out, but that was a very nice surprise (I only now realized that the description says Activity eBook included) and I look forward to using them. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Are you ready to count bears?!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 22 mos old. He loves it! Every morning he brings me his bears! From the first time I showed them to him he was excited to count bears! So now all I have tp do is ask if he wants to count bears and he brings me the entire little box snd sits in his chair for me! The first learning activity that gets my toddler excited every time! Get this if you’re on the fence a out it! You won’t regret it! Cute carrying case. Bears are brightly colored and everything is packaged very neatly. The additional booklet that gets emailed after purchase is also a bonus! Thank you Legato!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this kit
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this kit. My 2 year old and 7 year old love it even more. They make all kinds of games up with the pieces: counting, color matching and any random thing they can think of. I've been finding find bears in random places, kitchen drawers, under the bed and I even found a couple in the toilet- so gross. That's my 2 year old's favorite game. Hope he grows out of that one soon. Anyway, I recommend this. I find no reason anyone would be disappointed. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Neeson

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great company
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, so versatile in ways to engage your child (both of my kids, 3 and 6 love using them in their play and school work). I was happy with the product, and then a 21 page pdf of ways to use the toy was sent to me. This was such an incredible addition as they offered many more ways to help me with my preschooler. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M.

customer_reviews.title: Good toy, my son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: When I first received my item, it was missing the set of purple bears. I wrote to the companies right away and not even 3 days later they sent me the missing pieces. They were very polite and accommodating. I would recommend to friends with kids that are looking to learn how to count and their colors. It’s a very cute toy, my son plays with it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Educational/Therapy Toy!
customer_reviews.text: We were blessed to adopt and one of our little ones struggles in gross motor/fine motor skills. This is the exact toy I was looking for to work at home with them to help with motor development, learning colors, speaking, etc. It really is awesome. Very well made and quick shipping!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adoption Wins!

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my 3 year old to help with his fine motor skills and pre school at home. He absolutely loves it! It’s a good activity to keep him busy independently and something we can do together. The set is nice, as expected. As an added bonus, I received an email from Legato with printable sorting and counting activities you can do using the bears. I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: The Monaghan's

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these counting bears. It is my 1 year old sons favorite toy. I literally have to hide the box. This is a great tool for teaching colors, counting and sorting. This is a huge hit with my 1 & 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M.

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile; great for toddler age!
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old toddler LOVES these teddy bears! She counts, sorts, lines them up, completes patterns with them, and so much more. The only thing is if your child still mouths things this may not be the safest to use, unless with adult supervision because the bears are small. IG @LifeWithAvaAndElla
customer_reviews.author: Life With Ava & Ella

customer_reviews.title: She asks to play with it daily!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter is obsessed and finds many ways to play with this. Well made. Sturdy allagator tweezer that aren't too hard to clamp like a lot of other tweezer product reviews complained about. Very great development tool for hand eye coordination and fine motor skills.
customer_reviews.author: Austin E.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I love this counting and colors learning tool.. colors are vibrant and the object are sturdy, this is a set you have to always assist young children with because the pieces are small enough for children to choke on. So please always be mindful. The seller was kind enough to contact me to make sure I received an ebook to go with the set. We exchanged emails and their response was prompt.. I really appreciated that!! Great experience!
customer_reviews.author: madeline

customer_reviews.title: High quality therapy toy
customer_reviews.text: This toy exceeded my expectations. I bought this toy for my autistic 3 year old that loves sorting, matching, and likes toys with bright colors. It was perfect for his ABA therapy, I'm extremely happy with this toy and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Serna

customer_reviews.title: Fun Educational Toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2 year old granddaughter's birthday, both she and her 5 year old sister love them! The free worksheets are a great addition to this educational toy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Bodenhorn

customer_reviews.title: Fun, engaging learing toy!
customer_reviews.text: My littles live this set! Arrived quickly. The company even sends you a pdf of activity sheets to go along with it, stuff like, pattern matching, counting, and sorting. It really keeps the kids engaged with the colorful bears and it comes with little grabber tongs that the kids love picking up the bears with! Just make sure to supervise play, or you'll have bears everywhere!!! Great buy to play and learn with your kiddos!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Great toy to help pass time and learn
customer_reviews.text: Great learning toy, something my 3 and 5 year olds can do to before time on electronics. Counting, sorting, color recognition and dexterity. May order more because I know some are bound to get lost. I did order activity cards to go with these.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dudley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this kit!! :)
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this kit! Quality materials. I also bought matching tweezers to pick up the counters. I use this kit in elementary school for my social skills lessons, and the kids loved playing the activities I've created to practice social skills using these counters! Thank you Legato Supply! :)
customer_reviews.author: Julie G.

customer_reviews.title: Special needs friendly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my special needs grandson for his 5th birthday. He loves it! His mother loves it! He is non verbal and has issues with fine motor skills. He can handle these bears with no difficulty. He can identify some of his colors now and can sort them appropriately. Thank you! I have never written a review before but I felt this deserved recognition. Vibrant colors, durability, and affordable. You deserve a woo-hoo!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A. Beischel

customer_reviews.title: Great Learning Toy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in the hopes that my son would like and he’s been playing with it since the moment it arrived! Even in just a few short days, his counting and sorting skills have improved so much. I highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: A high-quality product
customer_reviews.text: This counting and sorting kit is so simple but my grand kids just love it. the cups are a good size to fit the bears in and the kids love using the tweezers. All of the pieces are high quality. The container comes with a handle and holds everything to keep it organized and compact. It is amazing how long my toddler and pre-school grandchildren will sit and play with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Reeder

customer_reviews.title: GREAT educational toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 3yo niece absolutely LOVES these bears and cups!! Her mother said she carries them around with her everywhere. She knows her colors and says the color when putting the particular bear in the its matching cup. We are very happy with this product, it is everything the description said it is.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Sorting, counting & independent play!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 2 year old, he’s still working on the tongs but loves the sorting & counting. Lots of independent play too! I searched a few different versions of these & am glad I went with this one. Variety of colors but not too many, maybe eventually I’ll add in some varying sizes but for now these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes counting great.
customer_reviews.text: Great for learning how to count and organize. My toddler loves to sort out the bears into their matching cup color. I'm teaching my son the add and subtract and this helps. These types of bears have been around when I was a kid so its cool to see again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves this toy!! This helped him learn his colors and he loves sorting the bears. He’ll ask for his colors when he wants to sort them. He even uses the cute little tongs which are great for his fine motor skills. So cute!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: My 4 boys LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: My boys range from 6 to 1 and a half. They all love this and they love the free printables that came along. I bought it for my 3 year old and he will sit and use it for 30+ minutes; which is saying a lot for him. Great product; would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: There was an issue with the first set I ordered. It was missing the orange bears. Customer service got in touch with me and had the issue corrected in a jiffy. The set is well made and my daughter loves to play with them.
customer_reviews.author: vmartin2304

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: My son is delayed and we got this for him to work on colors, counting, and his dexterity. He loves them as they hold his attention. Hoping to eventually use them for simple math (two red bears and 1 yellow bear, how many bears)
customer_reviews.author: Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew. He doesn’t speak much due to his condition but after purchasing this product he was focused and surprised us all when he was saying all the colors out loud. This is a great product for children who love to sort!
customer_reviews.author: kdelasoul

customer_reviews.title: Counting bears are wonderful
customer_reviews.text: We do a lot of sensory activities and fine motor activities for my early years Instagram page, these bears are perfect. Six different colors, six different cups, tongs and they email you a workbook. Love love love these!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. No hard or pointy edging on the ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. We use it to work on her colors, sorting, numbers, patterns. We use it a lot. She enjoys it as a learning tool and toy. Great quality. No hard or pointy edging on the toys.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Ka’uhane

customer_reviews.title: Great for play and education
customer_reviews.text: Bears came exactly was expected. I love that they came with matching cups and a case!. My daughter loves using the thongs to pick up the bears a d put them in places. We also been using the bears to learn addition and subtraction
customer_reviews.author: Quyen N.

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids told me today that this is their favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: I thought of this item more for my 2 year old grandson who is accustomed to sorting and working with colors at school, but his school is closed. I was surprised to hear from my precocious four year old who told me today that they have to take turns with it because they like it so much. They have lots of other toys. I am about to order 3 more sets for other children in my large family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeping the child's interest
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought he (my 2 year old grandson) would just throw them to the side. But then suddenly he decided they were cool and he still will sit and sort them. This is perfect for helping him with his motor skill, counting and colors. We never leave him alone with them because the recommended age is 3. Perfect product
customer_reviews.author: J Stanley

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old really liked playing with the little bears
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old really liked playing with the little bears. They are very durable and good quality. I loved the little carrying case, it makes for easy clean up and my little one likes to walk around with it like it is his briefcase. Good purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne C. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy!
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 loves this toy. He can play, put everything in the container, and take it to another room. Very easy for him to operate and no frustration for me.
customer_reviews.author: MasonsMama

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son to help him understand the concept of sorting, grouping, and patterns. He loves it! He thinks he is playing a game versus learning a new concept.
customer_reviews.author: kjohn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teaching colors and counting!
customer_reviews.text: These counting/sorting bears are great! My 2 year old loves sorting the colors and now she’s learning to count. Love the storage container. One of the best things I’ve bought for my toddler! But this, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and a good learning tool
customer_reviews.text: This are great for hand to eye coordination and working on colors, the bears are very tiny so you will need to monitor your small ones closely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute set to start introducing & learning colors. My son absolutely adores this product as he often runs to the shelf to grab the container. I also love that the storage container is made with locks on each side, a much needed feature for my toddler. -One suggestion I have would be to make the container big enough to be able to place all cups separately standing up. Would make it an on- the-go activity product to take anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Anabel Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, I guess
customer_reviews.text: this was a birthday [resent for my grandson in Washington State. I think he likes it. Haven't heard. You sent me the book, and I am forwarding it on to him. So far so good, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: cleoh moses

customer_reviews.title: High quality toddler friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler grandson . My daughter/teacher states this is a “very high quality, toddler friendly fun and developmentally appropriate. It comes in a nice sturdy box with 6 colored cups and lots of nice quality bears and tongs. Great for color naming skills, fine motor skills, sorting and can grow with a child. My very active toddler loves it and amazingly has spent 30 minutes playing with this!” Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: c.m.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and worth the money. They are brilliantly colored and durable. I was pleased to see the cups and bears come in a case. Easy for cleaning up and taking on the go! My severe ASD son loves them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon addicted Marylander

customer_reviews.title: Great for homeschooling! Children of all ages
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these counting bears. They are beautiful and sturdy. My kids had endless fun counting and color matching. It appeals to children of all levels. One is learning their colors to one that is just entering pre-K and counting on their lento the advanced 1st grader. I had to purchase more to give as a gift and more for the house. The kit is for one kid my 2 year old refused to share lol she loved it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Sebrina Webb

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My 2yr old loves sorting with colors, pouring the bears into other cups, and using the tongs provided to pick them up. Definitely ok to use with smaller toddlers, but supervision is a must due to the size of the bears.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie D.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great toy/learning activity for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: My 5yo and 2yo love these bears! Legato provided great customer service when my set arrived without any red bears. Jarett immediately sent us a full set plus some extras incase we lose some. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nrconder

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars all around
customer_reviews.text: I was beyond happy with this product. My daughter is low muscle tone due to having Down Syndrome so I purchased this to help with her “pincher grip” and it has been a huge help. The product is very well made and cute. So thankful I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN D HORNER

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves sorting so this was perfect for her. Everything pictured fits nicely into the clear plastic container.
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyT

customer_reviews.title: Great learning and fun!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a Christmas gift for my 2.5 year old. He absolutely loves it - we have found many different ways to play with the bears. Many hours of learning and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves these and can play with them for ...
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves these and can play with them for hours! We use them for all sorts of stuff and build castles out of magna tiles for her bears. I can see these sticking around for all sorts of stuff as she grows up!
customer_reviews.author: leahlouisa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would have been bigger then they are a toddler definitely can not just play with these
customer_reviews.author: marsha hensal

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are colorful and nice quality - not just hard plastic. Great sorting toy and for learning with young toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: breezenby

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3 year old loves this set. There are so many creative ways to play with it. I also like that it’s all able to be stored together in the container it comes in. High quality product that encourages self directed play and learning.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey M.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Loved This!
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as pictured. The colors are vibrant and attractive. The bears are cute and perfect for little fingers. Came with color coordinated cups and two tongs. I especially loved to see that the product was conveniently sold in a small and durable latch lid tote with handle. Perfect buy for my kindergartener!
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: So much learning in one little box!
customer_reviews.text: Not a day has gone by that my 2 y 3 mo daughter hasn’t played with her bears since being introduced! And having a place for them to go back to when she’s done is so crucial! Love that there are two sets of tongs so she can have a friend play with her as well. Thanks for creating a perfect little travel kit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine motor. Math. Language and many more. Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: The items are of good quality. The tweezers are just the right size for my students. Everything is just as described. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Best Counting Bears Available
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because of great reviews, the price and because the set has 10 bears of each color. Everything came that was listed. Shipped on time and in good condition. Grand daughter is too young to use now but it sure looks fun. She loved the bright colors and shaking the unopened bag of bears. The e activities you emailed are darling and have such a wide variety of ideas we will be excited to give them a try when non food items stop going in the mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Great product

customer_reviews.title: Great for teaching toddlers!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for teaching my twin 2 year olds colors, sorting, and fine motor skills with the addition of the Tongs! I even bought this for my friends sons 2nd birthday because we loved it so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works On fine motor and cognitive skills. Colorful with a perfect style/size tong. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Busy Toddler must have
customer_reviews.text: So many uses for this set. Color sorting, counting, fine motor skills, etc. I’m so glad I finally got this set.
customer_reviews.author: T M Tanton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My 2-Year-Old!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my 2-year-old! She loves taking things in and out of containers to begin with, and the added challenges of sorting the colors and using the little tongs is a great next step for her!
customer_reviews.author: Monica H.

customer_reviews.title: They are great for sorting
customer_reviews.text: I just got my counting bears for my 4 year old daughter, and she LOVES them!! They are great for sorting, counting, adding, subtracting, hand eye coordination, small motor skills, and many more things!! I also love that they came with a little tote to keep all the materials in!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy that I got these, my kids love it! They stay there playing for a long time. I need to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to do activities with my 2 year old for speech therapy. They are great! My 4year old also loves to play with them! The pdf with the printables is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: These bears are a hit for my 4 year old daughter who loves teddy bears! She and her sisters have fun making up games with them. They are so creative, it's nice having a toy like this that fuels creativity with endless possibilities. The set came missing the tweezers, but were promptly sent upon contacting the company.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel W.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sorting bears for my special needs daughter. We will work with her on sorting by color and also the use of the tongs for building strength in her hands! Love love love this item!
customer_reviews.author: Amzon reader

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these counting bears! My daughter (2 years old) has caught on very quickly with the sorting, and it has helped her learn colors. It is one of the few toys she will actually sit and play with for a lonv time. She is working on being able to use the tongs, which is a great skill for little ones. Overall we are very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Torrie Dreibelbis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price!! Very nice for working on fine motor, counting, color identifying, sorting and matching skills!

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: We are home quarantining and trying to do educational things with our toddlers that they don’t realize are educational - I’ve told all my friends to buy these. Our four year old can count them and our 2 year old can color sort! Great!

customer_reviews.text: Are great in my classroom. I had another set from somewhere and had lost bears along the way. The flat point tweezers are a little hard for my littles to use, but I think they can get the hang of it.

customer_reviews.text: great colors and sturdy. the sizes are not graduated and it doesn't help as much with teaching sizes to pre-schoolers

My 2 year old, 3 year old and 5 year old had a blast counting them, sorting the different colors and just playing with them! 5stars!!

In addition to developing fine motor coordination, he is always talking about colors, playing with the bears individually, arranging the cups on top of each other in the shape of a pyramid. There are several ways to explore.

product_meta.title: Legato Counting/Sorting Bears; 60 Rainbow Colored Bears, 6 Stacking Cups, Kids Tweezers, Storage Container, and Activity eBook. Quality Educational Toy, Good for STEM and Montessori Programs.
product_meta.description:
Watch your child learn and have fun while they sort, count, match, and play with these high quality teddy bear counters. Focus on one skill at a time, or let your preschooler explore several skills at once. They’re perfect for children ages 3 and above (or younger toddlers with close adult supervision). When playtime is over, you can tuck everything away neatly in the included plastic container.

Key Educational Benefits:
Counting
Sorting
Patterning
Matching
Math Skills
Color Recognition
Hand-Eye Coordination
Fine Motor Skills

You may be surprised by what your child comes up with due to the open-ended nature of this toy. Making rows, organizing by color, pouring from cup to cup, counting by pairs, and stacking the cups are just a few of the activities they are likely to discover. Practicing addition and subtraction is more intuitive than other methods, and this toy makes learning math skills much more enjoyable. The tweezers add an additional challenge, and counting to 50 or 60 is easily demonstrated.

What's Included:
60 colored bears (10 per color)
6 colored cups (toddler-sized)
1 pair of large tweezers
1 storage container

These math manipulatives are great for home school programs and Montessori methods of education, as well as with STEM teaching. They’re a go-to item in preschool and kindergarten classrooms, and especially useful in occupational therapy, special education, and helping kids with autism. At home, these vibrant rainbow bears can take on multiple uses as your child’s creativity and imagination are stretched. Since the set is waterproof, it can even be played with in the bathtub. As your child grows, your Legato Counting Bears will take on new uses and be enjoyed for years.
feature_bullets: HOURS OF FUN: Kids love counting, sorting, matching, and playing with these adorable bears. The bright rainbow colors make this toy visually stimulating as well. And when playtime is over, place everything inside the plastic container for quick clean-up and convenient storage.

EDUCATIONAL: Math skills, color recognition, sorting abilities, and hand-eye coordination are just some of the skills your child will be learning! The large tweezers also encourage fine motor skill development, and help strengthen and prepare little hands for future skills such as writing. ALSO INCLUDED is an eBook with 20 educational activity sheets! Our counting bears work perfectly in conjunction with STEM and Montessori programs, and with special needs children.

QUALITY: Legato Counting Bears are made of high quality plastic, and are completely solid with no holes in the bottom. The cups, tweezers, and container are also made with quality materials that will last for years and years to come.

SAFE: We take safety very seriously, and this product is non-toxic, BPA free, and conforms to the strict standards set by the US Standard Consumer Safety Specifications for Toy Safety. PLEASE NOTE that the bears are slightly over 1" tall, and therefore require close adult supervision for children under 3 years of age.
